title: CHA Acupuncture
cleaned_text: * COVID-19 Update: Patients will be prescreened by phone before they come for the appointment for any sign of illness or exposure of the risk of COVID-19 and advised to keep wearing a mask during the treatment. We follow CDC guidelines as we keep wearing a mask in social distancing and wiping down the surface or contact area with Lysol or Clorox between the patients. Patients feel at ease knowing that Dr. Koo takes this additional level of precaution to make safe for patients and communities. We now offer [At-Home Safety Visits](/at-home-safety-visit) for the added level safety and convenience! Services Acupuncture is an ancient medical system over 4000 years old, a form of complementary and alternative medicine which is based on Traditional Chinese Medicine. This practice deals with subtle energy flows in the body to promote the healthy flow of "Qi" or life force. Acupuncture is the procedure of inserting and manipulating sterile needles into various points on the body for treatment of pain or disease and therapeutic purposes. The needles may vary in size, depending upon your condition and the course of treatment prescribed. Traditional Acupuncture Acupuncture Facelift Auricular Acupuncture Traditional Chinese
